about_the_game:
Create cubes and prisms using just your hands in this playful and intuitive VR experience. Grab and stack blocks, or knock them over. Select between different shapes using a simple menu that appears alongside your outstretched hand. You can even swing your hands up to turn off your universe’s gravity, spin objects into space, and bring everything down to earth!

This iconic VR experience is built for Ultraleap V5 (Gemini) with our interaction engine, which lets you experience nuanced physical interactions with digital objects in a way never before possible.

Please ensure Ultraleap Gemini has been launched before launching this DLC demo app!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070, 1080, 2080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Hand tracking requires Ultraleap Gemini or Hyperion and a connected Ultraleap tracking camera
